channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: YouTuber ‘plays with death’ as he enters bear cave moments before it returns
item.description: Influencer Stefan Jankovich is the newest contestant for scariest stunt of the year, as he willingly sits in a bear cave waiting for it the return.

item.title: Mum admits editing DNA test result to say new boyfriend was dad of her baby
item.description: Georgina Saville said it was 'obvious' the DNA test results letter wasn't a real form as she 'didn't go to a lot of effort' to make it

item.title: Market town’s art gallery in hot water over very fruity window display
item.description: Artist Poppy Baynam said women who object are probably heterosexual and have never seen a vulva.

item.title: 'Reliable' ghd styler that’s ‘perfect for thick and curly hair’ gets £64 price cut
item.description: ghd's Platinum+ styler that 'glides through hair perfectly' and ensures damage-free styling has been slashed by a £64 in a limited-time deal

item.title: Meghan Markle hit with claims she 'chewed up' employees as staff row deepens
item.description: Both former and current staff of Meghan Markle rushed to her defence and spoken of their positive experiences of working for her following allegations...

item.title: The ‘nuclear test’ spotted by a satellite nobody’s owning up to 45 years later
item.description: The double flash could have been a nuclear explosion of two to three kilotonnes - equivalent to 2-3,000 tonnes of TNT.

item.title: Gurning champion is so good she’s just won it for the eighth year in a row
item.description: The act of pulling silly faces is an art form, perfected over time, with competitors returning year after year to take part.

item.title: Expert's ice cube watering trick keeps houseplants alive all year round
item.description: If you're not a natural gardener, you may be looking for some easy hacks to keep your plants alive. One expert has shared a simple ice cube trick that...

item.title: Zoo’s ‘barking’ pandas turned out to be painted dogs
item.description: People have, understandably, asked for their money back.

item.title: Primark's £8 teddy bear pjs are 'so comfy' people 'can't stop wearing them'
item.description: The set £8 pyjama set has gone viral on TikTok with dozens of shoppers snapping up the 'cosy' loungewear - and it's now back in stock
